effect.description: If specified, only the status effect with this namespace and ID can not be applied to the entity that has the power.
effect.markdownDescription: If specified, only the status effect with this namespace and ID can not be applied to the entity that has the power.

effects.description: If specified, only the status effects with the specified namespace and IDs can not be applied to the entity that has the power.
effects.markdownDescription: If specified, only the status effects with the specified namespace and IDs can not be applied to the entity that has the power.

inverted.description: Determines whether to make the entity immune to the status effect(s) that aren't specified.
inverted.markdownDescription: Determines whether to make the entity immune to the status effect(s) that aren't specified.

type.description:
## Effect Immunity

---



[Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/effect_immunity)

Prevents status effects from being applied to the entity that has the power.

Type ID: `origins:effect_immunity`




---

### Examples

```json
{
	"type": "origins:effect_immunity",
	"effects": [
		"minecraft:weakness",
		"minecraft:strength"
	]
}
```

This example will make the entity immune to the Weakness and Strength status effects.

This example will make the entity immune to the Weakness and Strength status effects.
